review: What I love about Chromecast is:1. The price.  I am saving lots of money by cancelling my cable subscription.  I am using it for Netflix, Hulu and MLBTV.2. When I launch shows from my laptop and cast them to my TV, I can then do other things on my laptop. I previously had an HDMI cable running from my laptop to my TV, but then couldn't used my laptop for anything else.  If I switched to work on a spreadsheet or another website, that would display on my TV instead of the show.  With Chromecast, the Chromecast device runs the show, leaving your laptop (or whatever device you used to originally launch the show) to be free for other uses.3. The beautiful photos that Chromecast cycles through as a screensaver on the TV.It was easy to set up.  I just followed the instructions and it was running in 5 minutes.  Once in the while, there is freezing but not often.  I'd rather have that then pay the outrageous prices for cable.
author: J. DeFlores
